dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: laughs loudly Oh my god, can you believe this? They're finally doing it! Driverless trains for the LRT!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, can you believe this? They're finally doing it! Driverless trains for the L R T!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana akimat (local government administration) has revealed how driverless trains for the city™s light rail transit (LRT) system are being assembled.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: scoffs "Finally doing it"? Host_A, are you serious? After how many years, how many billions, how many scandals?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: scoffs Finally doing it? Host_A, are you serious? After how many years, how many billions, how many scandals?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, but this is real! The akimat just put out the details – six cars in production, two already almost finished with painting, interior panels, everything! That's, like, actual progress.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but this is real! The akimat just put out the details - six cars in production, two already almost finished with painting, interior panels, everything! That's, like, actual progress.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Out of the 19 planned cars, six are currently in production. Two of the cars have completed painting, window and door installation, as well as the fitting of interior panels, flooring, roofing, air conditioning systems, lighting, multimedia equipment, and monitors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "Actual progress" means two partially assembled cars out of nineteen, years after they started? It's a bottomless pit, uh, of public funds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actual progress means two partially assembled cars out of nineteen, years after they started? It's a bottomless pit, uh, of public funds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Out of the 19 planned cars, six are currently in production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But they're driverless! GOA 4-level automation, collision prevention! This is future tech, man, for our city!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they're driverless! G O A four-level automation, collision prevention! This is future tech, man, for our city!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The trains will be driverless and equipped with GOA 4-level automation, which includes automatic operation, technical condition monitoring, and collision prevention systems,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Future tech, maybe, but for a train that barely has a track. Who exactly is going to be riding this cutting-edge, uh, ghost train, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Future tech, maybe, but for a train that barely has a track. Who exactly is going to be riding this cutting-edge, uh, ghost train, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: People will! And it's being built to international standards, Host_B. The first cars arrive in September for trials. This is, um, a major step forward for transport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People will! And it's being built to international standards, Host_B. The first cars arrive in September for trials. This is, um, a major step forward for transport.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Production processes are being carried out in accordance with international standards and are subject to technical control. The trains will be driverless and equipped with GOA 4-level automation, which includes automatic operation, technical condition monitoring, and collision prevention systems," the city akimat said. Photo: ¡TS The first train cars are expected to arrive in Astana in September, after which the trial run phase will begin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: September? Oh, another September. How many times have we heard that? And 'international standards' from Tangshan, China. With all due respect, I'm, like, skeptical.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: September? Oh, another September. How many times have we heard that? And 'international standards' from Tangshan, China. With all due respect, I'm, like, skeptical.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was previously reported that the trains for the capital™s LRT system are being assembled in the Chinese city of Tangshan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So what if it's China? They build world-class trains! And Kassymbek said it'll be fully completed by summer 2025. This is, you know, positive news, despite your cynicism.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So what if it's China? They build world-class trains! And Kassymbek said it'll be fully completed by summer twenty twenty five. This is, you know, positive news, despite your cynicism.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Zhenis Kassymbek announced that construction on the LRT will be fully completed by the summer of 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Positive? They've got six out of nineteen cars in some stage of assembly. That's, what, barely a third? And 2025 is just another moving target, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Positive? They've got six out of nineteen cars in some stage of assembly. That's, what, barely a third? And twenty twenty five is just another moving target, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Out of the 19 planned cars, six are currently in production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the automation! Think of the efficiency, the safety! It's, uh, what innovative cities are doing now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the automation! Think of the efficiency, the safety! It's, uh, what innovative cities are doing now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Innovative cities that have actual demand, actual coherent urban planning. Not, you know, a very expensive, very elevated white elephant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Innovative cities that have actual demand, actual coherent urban planning. Not, you know, a very expensive, very elevated white elephant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It connects to the airport! That's a crucial link!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It connects to the airport! That's a crucial link!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can see what the LRT station at Astana Airport looks like here.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A link that could have been achieved with, like, a few more modern buses for, I don't know, one tenth of the cost? This whole project, it's just, it's a monument to misplaced priorities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A link that could have been achieved with, like, a few more modern buses for, I don't know, one tenth of the cost? This whole project, it's just, it's a monument to misplaced priorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You always look for the negative! This is a symbol of ambition, of moving forward! We should be, um, celebrating this!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You always look for the negative! This is a symbol of ambition, of moving forward! We should be, um, celebrating this!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'll celebrate when I see an actual passenger riding a full line, Host_A. Not, uh, just another press release about partially painted shells.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'll celebrate when I see an actual passenger riding a full line, Host_A. Not, uh, just another press release about partially painted shells.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I think it's genuinely exciting. Driverless trains, coming soon. Pretty cool, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I think it's genuinely exciting. Driverless trains, coming soon. Pretty cool, if you ask me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "Coming soon" has been the tagline for years. It's, like, a very expensive, very slow, very drawn-out joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Coming soon has been the tagline for years. It's, like, a very expensive, very slow, very drawn-out joke.
